actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, promotes the discharge of pus, generates flesh and expels toxins.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Qi Deficiency with weakness, lassitude and loose stools.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
With Huang Qi and Fang Feng, for spontaneous sweating with aversion to Wind due to Wei Qi Deficiency.
Releases the Exterior, expels External Wind, expels Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
Dispels Wind, disperses Wind-Heat, transforms Phlegm, softens hardness, eliminates toxins, dissipates nodules and stops itching and pain.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, vents rashes and relieves itching.
Prevents leakage of fluids, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and dissipates maculae.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

symptoms: The scales and crusts are greasy
The lesions often exude an unpleasant odor
There may be fissures on and around the lesions that affect the nasolabial folds and behind the ears
